thread.title: Wilson talks injuries, backups reps and more on radio show

author: Mike Miller, The Hoosier Scoop
title: Wilson talks injuries, backups reps and more on radio show
text:
Larger font size Posted: Wednesday, October 21, 2015 10:26 pm Wilson talks injuries, backups reps and more on radio show Mike Miller, The Hoosier Scoop heraldtimesonline.com | 0 comments 
Jordan Howard is “doing more” in practice this week, Kevin Wilson reported on his weekly radio show Wednesday.
